title: Unseen Bean
brief_description: Features two episodes of the popular Mr Bean sketches: “Back to school Mr Bean” sees the bumbling Mr Bean wreaking havoc in an art class, a judo lesson and a science class. It is however Mr Bean’s much loved Mini-minor which comes off second best. No-one in their right minds would let Mr. Bean loose with a pair of scissors, but in “Hair by Mr. Bean of London” he does exactly that. His perfect day of cutting and slashing is topped off when Teddy wins a prize at the fete. However at the train station Mr Bean is once again a victim of circumstance.
